description: Chief Petty Officer Masshikaku is a dull-looking subordinate to http://anidb.net/ch2060 [Smoker] and http://anidb.net/ch2061 [Tashigi]. He follows them around Loguetown for a while and was shown to be terrified of Luffy`s 30,000,000 beli bounty. His name means "Really Rectangular", which is an accurate description of his features. His name was first given in Grand Data File: Blue.
name: Masshikaku
